\begin{document}
  
\section*{Lab - 9}

Matt Laws, Leah Williams

\subsection{Minimal Formal Grammar}


$\langle Expr \rangle := \langle Sentiment \rangle +  "\backslash n"$ + $\langle Keyword \rangle +  "\backslash n"$ + $\langle Line \rangle^+$

% \hspace{40pt} $|$ $\langle Keyword \rangle$

% \hspace{40pt} $|$ $\langle Line \rangle$\\

$\langle Keyword \rangle := \langle word \rangle^*$


% \hspace{40pt} $|$ $\langle word \rangle$

$\langle Sentiment \rangle := \langle word \rangle$

\hspace{70pt} $| \epsilon$

$\langle Line \rangle := \langle word \rangle^+ + "\backslash n"$

% \hspace{40pt} $|$ $\langle word \rangle$
$\langle word \rangle := \langle letter \rangle^+ \in \{\text{CMU Pronunciation Dictionary}\}$

$\langle Letter \rangle := \{a...z\}$


\subsection{Minimal Semantics}

\begin{center}
\begin{tabular}{ |c|c|c|c|c| }
 \hline
 Syntax & Abstract Syntax & Type & Prec./Assoc & Meaning \\ 
 \hline
 Word & word of string & string  & N\textbackslash A &  \makecell{Word is a primitive that represents\\ a string of alpha characters that\\ is contained in the CMU Pronunciation Dictionary} \\
 \hline
 Line & Line of word list & string list & N\textbackslash A &  \makecell{Line is a list of words that \\ represents a line of a song\\ that will be converted to new words\\ each word is independent of each other} \\ 
 \hline
  Keyword & Keywords of word list & string list & N\textbackslash A & \makecell{Keywords is a field that takes in a list of words\\ and saves them as keywords to be\\ added into the newly transformed song} \\ 
 \hline
 Sentiment & string & string & N\textbackslash A & \makecell{Sentiment is a field that takes in a word \\and adds words to priority words list\\ according to a given sentiment} \\ 
 \hline
 Letter & char & char &  N\textbackslash A &  \makecell{ Letter is a primitive. We represent chars\\ using unicode character values F\# data type } \\
 \hline
  Line + $\backslash n$ + Line & \makecell{Sequential lines\\ of line list} & string list list &  \makecell{first \\ changed\\ first} &  \makecell{ We parse each line in order when we transform\\ them into new lines} \\ 
 \hline
 CMU\_dict & \makecell{dict of \\records list} & record list &  \makecell{ N\textbackslash A } &  \makecell{ This is the dict we query to do our\\ word conversions, it stores and entry for each \\word and its emphasis and rhyme. It is an internal \\resource, and it returns the word FAIL if it cannot\\ find a match} \\
 \hline
 
\end{tabular}
\end{center}
